channel.title: CVE Feed for Accellion -- FTP Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Accellion -- FTP Server

item.title: CVE-2016-9499|2024-08-06T02:50:38.579Z -- accellion -- ftp%20server
item.description: Accellion FTP server prior to version FTA_9_12_220 only returns the username in the server response if the username is invalid. An attacker may use this information to determine valid user accounts and enumerate them.

item.title: CVE-2016-9500|2024-08-06T02:50:38.629Z -- accellion -- ftp%20server
item.description: Accellion FTP server prior to version FTA_9_12_220 uses the Accusoft Prizm Content flash component, which contains multiple parameters (customTabCategoryName, customButton1Image) that are vulnerable to cross-site scripting.
